Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Novotel Atria Nimes Centre places you in the heart of Nimes, walking distance from Archaeology Museum and Nimes Arena. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Nimes Museum of Fine Arts and Nimes Cathedral.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 119 guestrooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have bathtubs or showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and you can also request irons/ironing boards.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and a hair salon.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and a hair salon.

Bathrooms have bathtubs or showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and you can also request irons/ironing boards.

A stay at Novotel Atria Nimes Centre places you in the heart of Nimes, walking distance from Archaeology Museum and Nimes Arena. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Nimes Museum of Fine Arts and Nimes Cathedral.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Archaeology Museum - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Nimes Arena - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Nimes Museum of Fine Arts - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Nimes Cathedral - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Herbes Square - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Old Nimes Museum - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Theater de Nimes - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Maison Carree - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Musee d'Art Contemporain - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Museum of Modern Art - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Nemausus - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Fountain Gardens - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Temple of Diana - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Magne Tower - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Parc Expo Nimes - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi

The nearest airports are:
Nimes (ZYN-Nimes SNCF Train Station) - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Nimes (FNI-Garons) - 9.3 km / 5.8 mi

The preferred airport for Novotel Atria Nimes Centre is Nimes (FNI-Garons).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Novotel Atria Nimes Centre is Nimes (FNI-Garons) - 9.3 km / 5.8 mi.
